basics.name: Corben Broennimann
basics.label: Android Developer
basics.summary: I am Computer Scientist and former Android Developer contractor at Capital One seeking to enrich and innovate the world. I'm hoping to gain more experience working with software and on development teams to challenge myself and grow my skills.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
Hawaii Community College Palamanui, Kailua-Kona, HI

work.summary: Provide safe and reliable bus transportation to the citizens of Durham
highlights: Follow planned bus routes, making scheduled stops to pick up or drop off passengers
Communicate with the dispatcher via two-way radio during the route; providing updates to the dispatcher and reports emergencies, traffic patterns, or accidents
Handle customer interactions with professionalism offering assistance where necessary, especially for disabled passengers

work.summary: Android Developer contracted to work at Capital One with a team developing a feature for the Capital One mobile app, and its thousands of users
highlights: Worked as a contractor with Capital One, to assist in the development and management of the address book feature, in their multi-million user mobile banking app
Implemented several first time user UI screens, following given specifications
Rapidly learned the code and in-house libraries used by Capital One for its banking app
Developed JUnit and UI tests to automate regression testing, utilizing the Mockk library and Mimic tools
Utilized GitHub to submit code, review team members’ submissions, and keep a thorough versioning history of my assignments and the application
Debugged and refined various tests, functions, features and calls to the API to ensure more optimal performance of the application

work.summary: Monitor and teach a group of students afer school, how to fly and operate drones
highlights: Instructed classes of 3 to 8, elementary to middle school students, on how to fly and safely operate a drone
Created multiple activities to challenge and engage the students with piloting a drone
Taught students a range of skills from how to safely land, do tricks, and operate a drone mounted camera

work.summary: Assist students in learning the material of the course
highlights: Assisted students with questions in regards to the concepts and homework from an intermediate level computer science course
Debugged students’ code, walking them through the process slowly to help them arrive at the solution on their own
Guided students to solutions rather than giving them the answers
Meet and greet guests at the lounge, handling and storing the luggage until they pick it up
Sell and manage lounge amenities to guests to boost sales and keep quality service
Arrange bus pickups for guests from the lounge to their hotels

work.summary: Fullfill duties around the office, greet guests at the airport, and aid in dispatch
highlights: Process and register tour groups in Roberts Hawaii’s scheduling system, fax the information back to the respective tour groups
Take calls from customers and assist them, coordinating with office staff when needed
Greet guests arriving at the Airport and show them to their hotel shuttle bus
Communicate and coordinate with bus drivers over dispatch

volunteer.summary: Help the local library set up their book sales to get rid of their excess books
highlights: Cart out boxes of books out to sales area
Set up the books so customers can clearly see and access all of the books
At the end of the day move the boxes with remaining books back into storage

volunteer.summary: Help educate tourists and beach goers about how reefs work, why they are valuable, and how to protect them before going into the water
highlights: Talking to random people and giving them necessary information
Understanding the reef, how it works, how it useful, why we need to protect it and how we can protect it

awards.title: Youth Citizenship Award
awards.summary: An award granted to a youth in a community who has given back to their community in a meaningful way.

awards.title: Life Plan Youth Leadership Award
awards.awarder: Youth Leadership Life Plan Institute of Hawaii
awards.summary: An award for participating in Youth Lifeplan leadership, where in we helped newer students begin to think about the future and prepare for college and employment.
